plugins.name: Padding Scaler
plugins.description:
Padding Scaler helps designers rapidly create compact, default, and spacious layout variants by scaling the vertical paddings of auto-layout frames.


Instead of editing each value manually, simply select your frames, choose a scale (0.5× to 4×), and instantly apply consistent spacing changes.


Ideal for testing different density modes or aligning with design system spacing tokens.


✨ Features:


Works with one or many auto-layout frames


Choose vertical, horizontal, or both directions


Fast, intuitive UI with live scaling preview


Save time, stay consistent, and iterate layout decisions faster.
plugins.tagline: Instantly scale vertical and/or horizontal paddings in auto-layout frames to test density modes.

plugins.name: World Clock
plugins.description:
Stay in sync with your global team — right inside Figma.

World Clock Plugin lets you add real-time clocks for any city around the world. Just type a city name, select it, and instantly view its current time in a beautifully minimal interface.


Perfect for remote teams, cross-border collabs, and late-night design sprints.
plugins.tagline: Never ask ‘What time is it there?’ again.

plugins.name: Figma Link Exporter
plugins.description:
igmaファイル内のセクション（Section）、コンポーネント（Component）、コンポーネントセット（ComponentSet）、バリアント（Variant）を自動検出し、それぞれの直接リンクを生成するプラグインです。デザインシステムの管理や共有に最適です。

主な機能

  1. 自動検出: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、コンポーネントセット、バリアントを自動で検出
  2. 詳細情報表示: 各要素の番号、種類、名前、直接リンクを一覧表示
  3. 複数形式でエクスポート: 検出した情報をTXT、CSV、JSON形式でダウンロード可能

使用シーン

  1. デザインシステムのドキュメント作成
  2. チーム内でのコンポーネント共有
  3. 開発者へのデザイン仕様の引き渡し
  4. プロジェクト管理のための要素整理

使い方

  1. プラグインを起動
  2. 「情報を取得」ボタンをクリック
  3. 検出された要素の一覧を確認
  4. 希望の形式（TXT/CSV/JSON）を選択してダウンロード
  5. シンプルな操作で、デザインファイル内の重要な要素へのリンクを素早くエクスポートできます。
plugins.tagline: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、バリアントを自動検出し、それらの直接リンクをTXT/CSV/JSON形式でエクスポートできるプラグインです。

plugins.name: QR Generator
plugins.description:
Generate crisp, scannable QR codes directly in Figma—for free. Whether you’re linking to a website, product, or prototype, it’s never been easier to add functional codes to your designs.


Need more than just the basics? Unlock the ability to fully customize your QR codes:

– Adjust colors to match your brand

– Tweak corner and eye styles

– Control padding, sizing, and error correction

– Apply your own design language


Perfect for teams and designers who want their work to look as good as it works.

Use it for client presentations, posters, packaging, or anything else where detail matters.


Free to generate. Paid to make it yours.


You can contact us at support@easestud.io

visit easestud.io
plugins.tagline: Simple QR codes, beautifully yours.

plugins.name: Reverse Variable Order
plugins.description:
Easily reverse the order of your variable values with


  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables
  4. Reverse


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive.
  2. Updating variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate.


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Flip the order of values in your variable groups

132291.name: Reverse Variable Order
132291.description:

  1. Select your collection
  2. Select the target mode or all modes
  3. Enter the path to a group of variables
  4. Reverse


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Plugin Notes

  1. Variable names and paths are case sensitive.
  2. Updating variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate.


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.
132291.tagline: Flip the order of values in your variable groups

plugins.name: TOC Please - Auto TOC Generator
plugins.description:
A plugin that helps you easily explore and manage complex Figma pages by generating a Table of Contents (TOC).


Features

1. In-plugin TOC generation

  1. Automatically collects frames with a specified prefix to generate a TOC
  2. Currently sorts frames based on their X-axis position on the Figma canvas (support for layer order coming soon)
  3. Click items to instantly navigate to the corresponding frame
  4. Supports up to 2 levels of nested items


2. Canvas TOC generation

  1. Create a TOC frame directly on the Figma canvas
  2. The TOC frame is fully customizable to suit your needs.
  3. When TOC content changes, simply select the TOC frame and click “Update” to refresh the content while preserving your custom styles.
plugins.tagline: Auto-generate a TOC from frames with a specific prefix. Click items to quickly navigate.

128139.name: TOC Please - Auto TOC Generator
128139.description:
A plugin that helps you easily explore and manage complex Figma pages by generating a Table of Contents (TOC).


Features

  1. Automatically collects frames with a specified prefix to generate a TOC
  2. Currently sorts frames based on their X-axis position on the Figma canvas (support for layer order coming soon)
  3. Click items to instantly navigate to the corresponding frame
  4. Supports up to 2 levels of nested items


2. Canvas TOC generation

  1. Create a TOC frame directly on the Figma canvas
  2. The TOC frame is fully customizable to suit your needs.
  3. When TOC content changes, simply select the TOC frame and click “Update” to refresh the content while preserving your custom styles.
128139.release_notes: Optimized speed of extracting frames for TOC
128139.tagline: Auto-generate a TOC from frames with a specific prefix. Click items to quickly navigate.

Effortlessly swap in and out fills and remix your designs with randomized solid colors, gradients, images, and more — without moving or disrupting your layout. It’s the ultimate productivity hack for mood boards, prototypes, and rapid design exploration. Fast, fun, and non-destructive.


Try it for free, and see what clicks.

133576.description:

Effortlessly swap in and out fills and remix your designs with randomized solid colors, gradients, images, and more — without moving or disrupting your layout. It’s the ultimate productivity hack for mood boards, prototypes, and rapid design exploration. Fast, fun, and non-destructive.


Try it for free, and see what clicks.
133576.release_notes:
What’s New

- Improved performance for a smoother experience.
- Added Auto-Run on Launch option for keyboard shortcut configuration.
- Text layers within selections are now automatically ignored.
- Free evaluation period now available
133576.tagline: Randomly swap fills within a selection

plugins.name: Heavy Page Organizer
plugins.description:
Heavy Frame Organizer is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly organize components and sections on your canvas. With customizable spacing options, the plugin automatically arranges your main component at the top left, and positions related sub-components vertically below it. Sections are moved to the right of the main component, with spacing between each element based on user-defined settings. This tool helps streamline the organization of complex design files and improves your workflow efficiency.


Important:

The plugin only works while listening to Meshuggah
plugins.tagline: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing pages.

127297.name: Heavy Page Organizer
127297.description:
Heavy Frame Organizer is a Figma plugin that helps you quickly organize components and sections on your canvas. With customizable spacing options, the plugin automatically arranges your main component at the top left, and positions related sub-components vertically below it. Sections are moved to the right of the main component, with spacing between each element based on user-defined settings. This tool helps streamline the organization of complex design files and improves your workflow efficiency.


Important:

The plugin only works while listening to Meshuggah
127297.release_notes:
New Features:
➕ Multi-column layout support: You can now organize multiple main components into their own columns.
📎 Sub-component alignment: Sub-components that begin with .[Main Component Name] are automatically grouped and aligned beneath their respective main components.
📄 Section column: Sections are now placed in their own vertical column to the far right.

UX Improvements:
🎯 Autofocus on first input for faster, smoother use.
⌨️ Return key support – press Enter to trigger the “Apply” action without needing to click.
127297.tagline: A very heavy Figma plugin for organizing pages.

plugins.name: Round Off
plugins.description:
This plugin helps avoid the Figma export bug where any decimal values in a frame's position values are are rounded up on export, resulting in a subpixel white line on the sides of your exported PNGs.


Apply to all top-level frames or to just to frames selected and remove all decimal values from the x and y positions before export.


Never see that white line again!
plugins.tagline: Avoid PNG export bugs by rounding off all decimals from your top level frames' position values.

130230.name: Round Off
130230.description:

Apply to all top-level frames or to just to frames selected and remove all decimal values from the x and y positions before export.


Never see that white line again!
130230.tagline: Avoid PNG export bugs by rounding off all decimals from your top level frames' position values.

plugins.name: Holy Shade
plugins.description:
Holy Shade - A Color Matching Challenge! 🎨


Test your color perception skills with Holy Shade, a fun and engaging game designed for designers, artists, and color enthusiasts! 🖌️


🔍 How to Play:


A target color is displayed at the top.


Choose the matching shade from the options below.


The closer your choice, the higher your score!


💡 Why Play?


Improve your color differentiation skills.


Sharpen your ability to recognize subtle shade variations.


Challenge yourself and compete for the highest score!


Are you ready to master the art of color perception? 🌈✨
plugins.tagline: A Color Matching Challenge!

plugins.name: Interflow Connect
plugins.description:
Transform your design-to-management workflow with Interflow Connect, the Figma plugin that brings your UI flows directly into the Interflow. Designed for product teams and designers who demand efficiency, Interflow Connect eliminates the tedious process of manual uploads, allowing you to focus on what truly matters—creating exceptional user interfaces.


Streamlined Workflow, Unmatched Efficiency


With Interflow Connect, transferring your designs from Figma to Interflow is as simple as a few clicks. Select your desired frames within Figma, assign or create the appropriate flow and section names, and upload your screens directly to the Interflow without ever leaving your design environment. This seamless integration ensures your UI flows are always up-to-date and easily accessible for audits and reviews, making collaboration across teams more efficient than ever.


Secure, Direct Integration


Security and simplicity are at the heart of Interflow Connect. By inputting and authenticating your personal API key—generated from your Interflow settings—the plugin securely identifies your account, organization, and product. This robust authentication process guarantees that your design data is transmitted safely and accurately, offering a streamlined connection between your creative process in Figma and your product management workflow in Interflow.


Empower Your Product Design and Management


Interflow Connect is more than just a plugin—it’s the bridge between your design interface and your management platform. Whether you’re refining your product’s UI, conducting detailed audits, or ensuring that every screen aligns with your design strategy, this plugin is engineered to supercharge your workflow. Enjoy a smoother onboarding process, reduce manual errors, and keep your design projects perfectly synchronized with your product roadmap.


Experience a new level of productivity and collaboration by integrating your design and management tools. With Interflow Connect, you’re not just uploading screens—you’re empowering your team to build better products, faster.
plugins.tagline: The bridge between your interfaces in figma and your interflow.

plugins.name: CSV to Table in Figma
plugins.description:
Transform your data into editable tables directly within Figma with the CSV to Table plugin. This plugin allows you to easily import and visualize your data in a structured format. Perfect for designers who need to incorporate data tables into their wireframes without the hassle of manual entry.


Key Features:


• Easy Import: Upload CSV files to automatically generate tables.

• Customizable Layouts: Define the number of rows and columns, and customize cell dimensions.

• Drag and Drop: Convenient drag-and-drop functionality for file uploads.

• Data Visualization: Instantly convert raw data into a clean, editable table format.

• Integration: Seamlessly works within Figma to enhance your design workflow.


Say goodbye to tedious data entry and hello to efficient data visualization. Enhance your Figma projects with structured tables in just a few clicks!
plugins.tagline: Transform Data Files into Editable Tables in Figma

plugins.name: Update Genres Usage
plugins.description:
The page must have at least one of the following section hierarchies with the following names and elements within them:


- info (section)
    - genre (section)
        - genre name (shape with text)   <----|
    - game (section)                      (connection)
        - game name (shape with text)    <----|



Genre name must be connected to shapes containing game names and only to them.




For example we have such structure:




"info" section _______________________________________
|
| "genre" section _________________________
| |                                       |
| |  "genre name 1"        "genre name 2" |
| |_________|_____________________|________
|           |-------------------> |
| "game" s._|____       "game" s._|_____
| |         v   |       |         v    |
| | "game name1"|       | "game name2" |
| |______________       |_______________
|
|_______________________________________________




After the update, it will look like this


"info" section _______________________________________
|
| "genre" section _________________________
| |                                       |
| |  "genre name 1"        "genre name 2" |
| |     (2/2)                   (1/2)     |
| |_________|_____________________|________
|           |-------------------> |
| "game" s._|____       "game" s._|_____
| |         v   |       |         v    |
| | "game name1"|       | "game name2" |
| |______________       |_______________
|
|_______________________________________________
plugins.tagline: Update Genres Usage

plugins.name: iMessage AI Chat Builder
plugins.description:
Accelerate your design workflow with an AI-powered plugin that integrates seamlessly with the iMessage Chat Builder UI kit. Use this plugin to instantly generate realistic iMessage screens and prototypes.


Using this plugin will allow you to configure the following chat properties:

  1. The number of chat participants
  2. The maximum number of messages in the chat
  3. Whether iMessage should default to light or dark mode
  4. The conversation topic and tone


Getting Started

To get started, follow these quick steps:


1. Install required fonts and symbols

This plugin uses Apple’s SF Pro and SF Mono font families - in addition to SF Symbols.


These fonts are not bundled with this file. SF Pro should now work natively within Figma’s desktop client, but you’ll still need to download and install SF Mono manually if you haven’t already done so.


2. Generate and enter an Anthropic API key

To use the plugin - you’ll need an Anthropic API key.


You can get one by:

  1. Visiting the Anthropic Console
  2. Signing in or creating an account
  3. Navigating to the API Key section of your account settings
  4. Clicking ‘Create Key’


Paste that API key into the plugin when prompted. Your key is stored locally and never shared.


Note: Anthropic may charge for API usage. Review Anthropic’s API pricing before proceeding with plugin use.


---


This plugin is not affiliated with or endorsed by Apple Inc, Figma Inc, or Anthropic PBC.

accepted.name: Pat Dugan
accepted.description: Front front, back back, sucker grab a snack pack.

plugins.tagline: Create convincing iMessage prototypes with AI. Turn ideas into iMessage prototypes instantly.

139757.tagline: Create convincing iMessage prototypes with AI. Turn ideas into iMessage prototypes instantly.

plugins.name: Figma Copilot
plugins.description:
Figma Copilot is your AI design partner that allows u to chat with AI about selected frames, components, or anything else on your Figma file. It is built to help you create better, more accessible, and more consistent products faster than ever. Stop guessing and start refining your work with expert-level feedback, right inside Figma.


Key Features

  1. Instant Design Reviews: Select any frame, component, or element and get immediate, actionable feedback on UI, UX, and accessibility.
  2. Expert-Level Heuristics: Powered by leading AI models, Copilot analyzes your work against established design principles like hierarchy, contrast, and consistency, acting as your personal UI/UX Design Expert.
  3. Use Your Own AI: Bring your own API key for your preferred provider: OpenAI (gpt-4o-mini), Google (gemini-1.5-flash), or Anthropic (claude-3-haiku) - stored locally on your computer.
  4. Context-Aware Analysis: The feedback is intelligently tailored to the specific element you've selected, whether it's a full user flow, a single button, or a text block.


How It Helps You

  1. Ship Faster: Catch common design issues before handoff.
  2. Improve Accessibility: Ensure your designs meet modern standards and are usable by everyone.
  3. Learn Best Practices: Get feedback grounded in proven design principles.
  4. Break Creative Blocks: Use the AI as a brainstorming partner to explore new ideas.


Install Figma Copilot today and elevate your design workflow!
plugins.tagline: Instant AI feedback on UI, UX, and accessibility.

plugins.name: Token Extractor & Kotlin Exporter
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you seamlessly export your design system tokens from Figma to Android development with Kotlin.


🎯 Key Features

• Scan selected components or frames for design tokens

• Supports primitives, spacing, and typography

• Converts tokens into Android-compatible Kotlin objects (Colors.kt, Dimens.kt, Typography.kt)

• Outputs clean, structured Kotlin code using dp, sp, and Color(...)

• Friendly UI with JSON preview and file export options


Perfect for Android teams using Jetpack Compose and looking to keep design & code in sync.
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma to Android-ready Kotlin files.

plugins.name: Fair Colors
plugins.description:
Fair Colors is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your color workflow, helping you manage, apply, and audit colors within your designs.


Key Features:


Extract Colors: Quickly grab all unique colors from your current selection, including solid fills and gradients.

Organize Palettes: Create and manage multiple color palettes, giving them custom names for easy organization.

Apply & Replace: Effortlessly apply saved colors to selected layers or replace existing colors throughout your selection.

Smart Highlighting: Instantly highlight all layers in your canvas that use a specific color, making auditing and adjustments a breeze.

Track Changes: Identify and manage color discrepancies by generating a "Fair Colors Changes" frame that visually shows differences between your saved palette and colors found in your selection.

Export Tokenized Colors: Generate a clean, tokenized reference frame of your used colors, perfect for design system documentation or developer handoff.

Fair Color helps you maintain consistency, identify rogue colors, and accelerate your design process by putting powerful color management tools right at your fingertips.
plugins.tagline: Local Color Palette System

plugins.name: Grid Forge - Create Tables using your Design System
plugins.description:
Grid Forge is a powerful Figma plugin that revolutionizes table creation by using your existing design system components. With intelligent auto layout, flexible width settings, and advanced data mapping, Grid Forge helps teams create responsive, consistent tables in seconds.


Use your own header and cell components, ensuring brand and Ul consistency. Configure columns with FIXED, HUG (with minimum width), or FILL modes, and instantly preview changes in

real-time.


Import data via CSV or Excel, map multiple fields per component, and watch as Grid Forge intelligently applies your design system to every table row saving time and maintaining design integrity across complex Uls like dashboards and forms.
plugins.tagline: Create responsive tables using your design system components, auto layout, and real data

Enhance your designs with a vast collection of unique avatars from Pixabay, all integrated directly into your Figma workspace! 🎨 Perfect for designers, marketers, and content creators looking to add a personal touch to their projects.

plugins.name: Image Uploader
plugins.description:
Transform Figma design into HTML and CSS is a powerful Figma plugin that helps you convert your Figma designs into clean, responsive HTML and CSS using AI model capabilities. With an intuitive multi-view UI inside Figma and a backend server that fetches image previews and processes visual data into code, This plugin empowers developers and designers to rapidly prototype web interfaces without manual slicing or coding.


Usage instructions


Prerequisites

  1. Node.js installed
  2. An OpenAI API key
  3. A Figma Personal Access Token (PAT)
  4. A Figma file with share access


Setup

npm install express openai dotenv node-fetch cors archiver


Set Environment Variables:

  1. Create a .env file in your project root with:
  2. OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_key


Run the Backend Server:

node server.js

This starts a local server at: http://localhost:3000

  1. Using the Plugin (UI inside Figma)
  2. Upload the plugin manifest and code.js + ui.html in Figma’s "Plugins > Development > New Plugin".
  3. Run the plugin from within Figma.
  4. On first view, click "Upload Figma File" to navigate to the second screen.
  5. Paste the Figma file URL and Figma API Token, then click Submit URL.
  6. A preview gallery of Figma frames will load. Click a thumbnail to select one.
  7. Preview the selected frame in the third view. Click Submit to generate code.


Output

The backend sends the image to OpenAI GPT-4o for code generation.


You receive a downloadable generated-ui.zip with:

html/

index.html

css/

styles.css
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma designs to responsive HTML / CSS instantly with AI-powered models accuracy and speed

plugins.name: Elemental
plugins.description:
Elemental lets you export images and copy color and shadow values in a single click—no need to set a layer to export, or break a color style to see the hex value. Elemental is built for those quick one-off moments when a developer needs an asset or another app is asking for your primary brand color.


What it does:

  1. Export one or more layers as images in your desired file type and size
  2. Copy the fill color of a layer to clipboard in your desired value type
  3. Copy the stroke color of a layer to clipboard in your desired value type
  4. Copy a layer's shadows in css format


How it works:

  1. Keep your Elemental panel handy
  2. Select a layer
  3. Click your desired export or copy button
plugins.tagline: Snag basic assets in a flash

136742.name: Elemental
136742.description:

plugins.name: CSV text replace
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Figma上のテキストレイヤーをCSVを使って効率的に一括置換・エクスポートできるツールです。

Figmaでのテキスト管理が多いプロジェクトや翻訳ワークフローに最適なプラグインです。


【主な機能】

①テキストの一括置換

CSVファイルにA列＝検索対象、B列＝置換内容を記述し、プラグインに読み込ませるだけで、Figma内の該当テキストを自動的に置き換えます。


②テキストのエクスポート

選択したフレームやテキストレイヤー内の文字列をCSV形式で書き出し。翻訳や編集作業との連携に最適です。


【使い方】

プラグイン起動後、

「リプレイス」タブでCSVファイルをアップロードし置換を実行

「エクスポート」タブでは、選択中のテキストをCSVでダウンロード可能

フレームを選択した状態では、そのフレームに含まれる全てのテキストレイヤーを一括でCSV化してダウンロードします


----


This plugin allows you to bulk replace and export text layers in Figma using CSV files—perfect for efficient content updates and translation workflows.

Highly useful for localization, bulk edits, or working with external editors.


[Key Features]

①Bulk Replace Text

Simply upload a CSV file where column A = target text and column B = replacement text. The plugin will find and replace matching text layers in your Figma file.


②Export Text

Export text content from selected frames or layers into a CSV file. Ideal for translation or review processes.


[How to Use]

Open the plugin and go to the “Replace” tab to upload your CSV and execute replacement.

Use the “Export” tab to download the text from selected layers as a CSV file.

When a frame is selected, all text layers within that frame will be exported together as a CSV file.
plugins.tagline: Replace and export text layers in Figma via CSV. CSVでテキストを一括置換＆エクスポート。

135288.name: CSV text replace
135288.description:
このプラグインは、Figma上のテキストレイヤーをCSVを使って効率的に一括置換・エクスポートできるツールです。

Figmaでのテキスト管理が多いプロジェクトや翻訳ワークフローに最適なプラグインです。


【主な機能】

①テキストの一括置換

CSVファイルにA列＝検索対象、B列＝置換内容を記述し、プラグインに読み込ませるだけで、Figma内の該当テキストを自動的に置き換えます。


②テキストのエクスポート

選択したフレームやテキストレイヤー内の文字列をCSV形式で書き出し。翻訳や編集作業との連携に最適です。


【使い方】

プラグイン起動後、

「リプレイス」タブでCSVファイルをアップロードし置換を実行

「エクスポート」タブでは、選択中のテキストをCSVでダウンロード可能

フレームを選択した状態では、そのフレームに含まれる全てのテキストレイヤーを一括でCSV化してダウンロードします


----


This plugin allows you to bulk replace and export text layers in Figma using CSV files—perfect for efficient content updates and translation workflows.

Highly useful for localization, bulk edits, or working with external editors.


[Key Features]

①Bulk Replace Text

Simply upload a CSV file where column A = target text and column B = replacement text. The plugin will find and replace matching text layers in your Figma file.


②Export Text

Export text content from selected frames or layers into a CSV file. Ideal for translation or review processes.


[How to Use]

Open the plugin and go to the “Replace” tab to upload your CSV and execute replacement.

Use the “Export” tab to download the text from selected layers as a CSV file.

When a frame is selected, all text layers within that frame will be exported together as a CSV file.

plugins.name: Panto: Rename Variables in a Snap!
plugins.description: Tired of manually renaming variable prefixes one by one? Panto is here to streamline your workflow! This powerful yet simple plugin allows you to batch rename the initial segment of your Figma variable names.
plugins.tagline: Batch Rename Variables, Simplified
